overview: You know the saying "an eye for an eye," but at Next Door Studios they take things a little farther in Cock for a Cock. James Huntsman, Connor Maguire and Brody Wilder start a high stakes pool game that is sure to end with a dick in somebody's face. John Magnum finds out that the thing about the best laid plans is that often it is better to scrap your plans and just get laid with roommate Zack Blake. Kyle Quinn is looking to buff up a little at his local gym, truth be told, the physique he really wants to focus on belongs to Jeremy Bilding, the trainer at the gym, and he's more than happy to give a few pointers. Steven and Cliff are on the mat in nothing but their jock straps and fighting is the last thing on their minds during their training session.
title: Cock for a Cock
